mapper.insert:
truncate kingdee_anti_fake_info_temp; INSERT INTO kingdee_anti_fake_info_temp( ant_fake_code, member_unionId, member_openID, query_date, box_barcode, carton_bar_code, product_code, product_name, bar_code, batch_no, expire_date, customer_name, sell_order_no, reserved_field1, reserved_field2, reserved_field3 ) VALUES
( #{antiFake.productCode}, #{antiFake.productName}, #{antiFake.productCategories1}, #{antiFake.productCategories2}, #{antiFake.productCategories3}, #{antiFake.productType}, #{antiFake.specification}, #{antiFake.expirationDate}, #{antiFake.unit}, #{antiFake.barCode}, #{antiFake.packingNumber}, #{antiFake.volume}, #{antiFake.grossWt}, #{antiFake.mainSuppliers}, #{antiFake.reservedField1}, #{antiFake.reservedField2}, #{antiFake.reservedField3} )
mapper.delete: DELETE from kingdee_anti_fake_info_temp where id in (SELECT s.id from( SELECT id from kingdee_anti_fake_info_temp st WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT min(id) id from kingdee_anti_fake_info_temp t GROUP by ant_fake_code) it WHERE it.id=st.id ) UNION ALL SELECT t.id from kingdee_product_temp t,kingdee_product tt WHERE tt.ant_fake_code=t.ant_fake_code) s)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kingdee_anti_fake_info( ant_fake_code, member_unionId, member_openID, query_date, box_barcode, carton_bar_code, product_code, product_name, bar_code, batch_no, expire_date, customer_name, sell_order_no, reserved_field1, reserved_field2, reserved_field3) SELECT ant_fake_code, member_unionId, member_openID, query_date, box_barcode, carton_bar_code, product_code, product_name, bar_code, batch_no, expire_date, customer_name, sell_order_no, reserved_field1, reserved_field2, reserved_field3 FROM kingdee_anti_fake_info_temp
